author: Zack Budryk
title: Birx: Testing must be performed 'down to the community' for accurate reopening timeline
description: Deborah Birx, the coordinator of the White House's coronavirus response, said Sunday that coronavirus testing must be focused more on individual communities as those communities and their states develop plans for reopenin...
content:
Deborah Birx, the coordinator of the White House's coronavirus response, said Sunday that coronavirus testing must be focused more on individual communities as those communities and their states develop plans for reopening.
Were a series of independent curve… [+1955 chars]
